problem_text_cn: 如图,测量河宽AB(假设河的两岸平行),在C点测得∠ACB=30°,D点测得∠ADB=60°,又CD=60m,则河宽AB为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, measuring the river width AB (assuming that the two banks of the river are parallel), measured at point C ∠ACB = N_0, measured at point D ∠ADB = N_1, and CD = N_2, then the width of river AB is ()
